fixes.name: Profit Margin %
fixes.solution_explanation: Created a row-level calculated column for Profit Margin % by converting the Tableau expression [Profit Ratio ]*100 to DAX multiplying the row's 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit Ratio ] by 100.

fixes.name: Profitablity Tier
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit Margin %] > 20,
    "High Margin",
    IF(
        'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit Margin %] > 10,
        "Medium Margin",
        "Low Margin"
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the Tableau IF / ELSEIF logic into nested DAX IF statements, evaluating the row-level 'Orders+ (Sample - Superstore)'[Profit Margin %] to return "High Margin", "Medium Margin", or "Low Margin".
